statements: DELETE FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE material = 'Plastic' AND lifecycle_stage = 'Production'
DELETE FROM packaging_tracking WHERE packaging_id = 100 AND status = 'Delivered';
DELETE FROM packaging_solutions WHERE weight > 50 AND material = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM packaging_lifecycle WHERE lifecycle_stage = 'disposal' AND production_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM packaging_products WHERE usage < 100 AND packaging_material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM packaging_material WHERE supplier = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM packaging_material WHERE material_name = 'Plastic' AND supplier = 'ABC Corp';
